author: Vicky Lahkar
comment: Option to edit or add events would be a treat!

author: Keri Ellis
comment: Great simple calendar app for Android Wear and a very responsive developer! He responded to my feature request same day and it was implemented shortly after.

author: Thijs Moen
comment: I like this app a lot,  it's simple yet very useful. I have one small question though: given that I live in the Netherlands could you perhaps add our national holidays to the holiday options? Thanks a lot

reply.author: Tuxerito-Soft
reply.content: Hi. Please update the app to version 1.6.8 and wait some minutes while the phone syncs the app on the watch. Thanks for the message.

author: Brandon Kalinowski
comment: Doesn't display my calendar events. The design is really nice and if it worked, I would use this app.

reply.author: Tuxerito-Soft
reply.content: You need to approve the permissions to access to your accounts and calendars and select the account.

author: Chima Alozie
comment: This app really helps simplify date checking for me on my wrist (and many others I believe) Developer answered my request to add my country in a swift and professional manner... Very impressive. Thanks very much and i encourage all to give this app a try.

reply.author: Tuxerito-Soft
reply.content: Thanks for the comment.

author: Tiffany Grabowski
comment: Will not let me use app. Keeps crashing!

reply.author: Tuxerito-Soft
reply.content: Hi. There is a new version 1.6.1 that includes support for Android 6+(Your version) with this version was fixed some errors related with the permissions that cause both apps(wear/phone) stop working. In Android 6+ you need to authorize manually 2 permission(Accounts/Calendar) Open the mobile app to enable those permissions in the Settings Window

author: Mo Alsharaf
comment: Nice aesthetics, looks attractive on LG watch Urbane. Improvements needed: doesn't show all calendar entries from phone calendar; I have multi-accounts on phone, and in account settings only gmail is listed. Please add public holidays for Canada, we are the big country on top of USA. Thanks :)
title: Nice looking

author: Rowena Scicluna
comment: You can't see today's calendar events, but you can see of any other day. Big shortcoming in my opinion.
title: Could be better

comment: I see the calendar on my phone but don't see any information about events reminders or scheduled events.                              Update seen another post where you said change something in preferences and it now works

comment: Installed and when I run it no events show.

reply.author: Tuxerito-Soft
reply.content: You need to select your account(s) on the preferences screen. If you did it try changing any option to sync again the preferences on the watch.

comment: Seems good so far, too bad Canada isn't in for holidays though. If you do add please remember there are some differing holidays per province. Would also be great to swipe up/down after clicking a day to be able to view the day before/after etc

comment: Works great. Emailed developer to include Australia, he replied in about 30 minutes and it was available in 2 hours. Thank you
